subject: Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant (Japan)
Refugees and Displaced Persons
Radiation
Baseball
Nuclear Energy
lead_paragraph: In the aftermath of the earthquake and tsunami that struck Japan, three high schools from affected areas came together to create a baseball team.
snippet: In the aftermath of the earthquake and tsunami that struck Japan, three high schools from affected areas came together to create a baseball team.
